segments.text: Hi , Lucy , are you free to talk ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really , I ’ m in a meeting . Can I call you back in ... say ... 15 minutes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , speak to you later . It isn ’ t urgent . Maybe it is easier if I send you an e-mail .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I ’ ll look out for it . Sorry , I can ’ t talk now .
segments.speaker: S1
